mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_path (title, description, total_steps, completed_steps, progress, status, user_id, start_time, end_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{totalSteps}, #{completedSteps}, #{progress}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE learning_path SET title=#{title}, description=#{description}, total_steps=#{totalSteps}, completed_steps=#{completedSteps}, progress=#{progress}, status=#{status}, user_id=#{userId}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, create_time=#{createTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, total_steps, completed_steps, progress, status, user_id, start_time, end_time, create_time, update_time FROM learning_path WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, description, total_steps, completed_steps, progress, status, user_id, start_time, end_time, create_time, update_time FROM learning_path ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, description, total_steps, completed_steps, progress, status, user_id, start_time, end_time, create_time, update_time FROM learning_path WHERE user_id=#{userId}
